languages.text: {n}Маражай смеривает вас долгим пристальным взглядом. Пауза начинает затягиваться, когда он наконец-то небрежно роняет.{/n} "Я не буду отвечать за свою сторону сделки, если ты забудешь о своей. Если мне будет недостаточно игрушек — твои слуги начнут умирать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай смеривает вас долгим пристальным взглядом. Пауза начинает затягиваться, когда он наконец-то небрежно роняет.{/n} "Я не буду отвечать за свою сторону сделки, если ты забудешь о своей. Если мне будет недостаточно игрушек — твои слуги начнут умирать".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай смеривает вас долгим пристальным взглядом. Пауза начинает затягиваться, когда он наконец-то небрежно роняет.{/n} "Я не буду отвечать за свою сторону сделки, если ты забудешь о своей. Если мне будет недостаточно игрушек — твои слуги начнут умирать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I won't hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, corpses of your servants will start piling up."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous dévisage longuement. Le temps reste suspendu un long moment, puis il se décide enfin à reprendre, d'un ton nonchalant.{/n} « Si vous venez à oublier les conditions de notre accord, sachez que j'en ferai autant. Dès que je n'aurai plus assez de jouets pour me divertir, les cadavres de vos serviteurs commenceront à s'amonceler. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous dévisage longuement. Le temps reste suspendu un long moment, puis il se décide enfin à reprendre, d'un ton nonchalant.{/n} « Si vous venez à oublier les conditions de notre accord, sachez que j'en ferai autant. Dès que je n'aurai plus assez de jouets pour me divertir, les cadavres de vos serviteurs commenceront à s'amonceler. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは長い間じっとあなたを見つめてから、淡々と告げた。{/n}「もしお前が約束を忘れるなら、俺も守るつもりはない。遊び道具が足りないと感じたら、お前の従者の死体が山積みになるだろうな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは長い間じっとあなたを見つめてから、淡々と告げた。{/n}「もしお前が約束を忘れるなら、俺も守るつもりはない。遊び道具が足りないと感じたら、お前の従者の死体が山積みになるだろうな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋盯着你看了很久，一言不发，最后终于若无其事地开了口。{/n}“我可以遵守我的承诺，但前提是，你也得遵守你的承诺。如果我那里的玩具不够我享受，那你的仆人恐怕就要血流成河了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋盯着你看了很久，一言不发，最后终于若无其事地开了口。{/n}“我可以遵守我的承诺，但前提是，你也得遵守你的承诺。如果我那里的玩具不够我享受，那你的仆人恐怕就要血流成河了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich lange an. Die Pause zieht sich unangenehm hin, bis er endlich beiläufig sagt:{/n} "Ich werde meinen Teil der Abmachung nicht einhalten, wenn Ihr den Euren vergesst. Sollte ich jemals das Gefühl haben, nicht genügend Spielzeug zu haben, werden sich Leichen Eurer Diener zu stapeln beginnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich lange an. Die Pause zieht sich unangenehm hin, bis er endlich beiläufig sagt:{/n} "Ich werde meinen Teil der Abmachung nicht einhalten, wenn Ihr den Euren vergesst. Sollte ich jemals das Gefühl haben, nicht genügend Spielzeug zu haben, werden sich Leichen Eurer Diener zu stapeln beginnen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira durante un largo rato. El silencio comienza a incomodarte, hasta que por fin habla con tono despreocupado.{/n} «No cumpliré mi parte del trato si tú olvidas la tuya. Como alguna vez me falten los juguetes, los cadáveres de tus sirvientes empezarán a amontonarse».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira durante un largo rato. El silencio comienza a incomodarte, hasta que por fin habla con tono despreocupado.{/n} «No cumpliré mi parte del trato si tú olvidas la tuya. Como alguna vez me falten los juguetes, los cadáveres de tus sirvientes empezarán a amontonarse».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana uzun uzun bakıyor. Duraksama daha da uzayacak gibi görünmeye başlarken sonunda soğukkanlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "Verdiğin sözü unutursan anlaşmamızın üzerime düşen kısmını yerine getirmem. Oyuncak eksikliği çekersem hizmetkârlarının cesetlerinden yığınlar ortaya çıkmaya başlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "I will not hold up my end of the bargain if you forget about yours. Should I ever feel a lack of playthings, the corpses of your servants will start piling up."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana uzun uzun bakıyor. Duraksama daha da uzayacak gibi görünmeye başlamışken sonunda soğukkanlılıkla konuşuyor:{/n} "Verdiğin sözü unutursan, anlaşmamın üzerime düşen kısmını yerine getirmeyeceğim. Oyuncak eksikliği çekersem, hizmetkârlarının cesetlerinden oluşan yığınlar ortaya çıkmaya başlar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
